duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to and implement communication strategies to promote the organization's mission, policy priorities, and accomplishments.
Write speeches and talking points for the leadership team and prepare core talking points for all staff and representatives for public appearances.
Draft and edit various communications on behalf of the President of the Board, including messaging documents, op-eds, and weekly videos.
Develop statements for press distribution, opinion pieces, editorials, and other media-related correspondence.
Identify press opportunities and develop content to be disseminated via social media platforms, websites, press releases, and other distribution channels.
Occasionally assist with breaking news, crises, or weather emergencies that may occur on nights and weekends.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Communications, English, Journalism, Public Relations, or related field (Master's preferred)
